channel.title: Donator Frosts not respawning
channel.description:
I've made some donator frosts with the ID 2862 since normal frosts are 51 and I want different drops but when I go into game they do not respawn? All the drops have change and all that but they just don't respawn
I have also deleted the .ncd file and the health has changed on the 2862 frosts to the same as 51. They just don't want to respawn?
The lines [code] 2862 - 1600 13151 13154 13153 5 1 60 213 SPECIAL 65535 65535 AGRESSIVE 51 - 1600 13151 13154 13153 5 1 60 213 SPECIAL 65535 65535 AGRESSIVE [/code]

item.title: Donator Frosts not respawning
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

I’m a bit confused as the 51 and 2862 is the same line, there is some files for like Kalphite queen? would this count as a custom boss or?

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Frosts not respawning
item.dc:creator: @thereaper93 thereaper93
item.description:
@thereaper93 wrote:

If everything works but the respawn it is most likely 1 of 2 problems.
You either don’t have their definitions set correctly so that they know to respawn, or somewhere in your files is something determining their spawn time and itsset to a high amount.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Frosts not respawning
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

[quote=“thereaper93, post:2, topic:549660”]Is it possible that you forgot to add them to the spawns?
Or maybe that you forgot to add them into the FrostDragon.java code the helps the game interpret the combatdef’s for each specific npc?
Now seeing as how I am a beginner coder I might not be of much help, but in order for anybody to truly help you they are going to need atleast the revision type, and preferrably the base as well.[/quote]
There is different files within a 667 for custom bosses, but does a 2862 count as a custom boss?

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Frosts not respawning
item.dc:creator: @thereaper93 thereaper93
item.description:
@thereaper93 wrote:

Is it possible that you forgot to add them to the spawns?
Or maybe that you forgot to add them into the FrostDragon.java code the helps the game interpret the combatdef’s for each specific npc?
Now seeing as how I am a beginner coder I might not be of much help, but in order for anybody to truly help you they are going to need atleast the revision type, and preferrably the base as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Frosts not respawning

item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

I’ve made some donator frosts with the ID 2862 since normal frosts are 51 and I want different drops but when I go into game they do not respawn? All the drops have change and all that but they just don’t respawn

I have also deleted the .ncd file and the health has changed on the 2862 frosts to the same as 51. They just don’t want to respawn?

The lines

2862 - 1600 13151 13154 13153 5 1 60 213 SPECIAL 65535 65535 AGRESSIVE
51 - 1600 13151 13154 13153 5 1 60 213 SPECIAL 65535 65535 AGRESSIVE
